thread.section_title: Hotel Beauchamps - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Fabulous location
thread.title_full: Fabulous location - Review of Hotel Beauchamps, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Emma D
title: Fabulous location
text:
I am just back from spending a weekend in Hotel Beauchamps, and I must say I was very impressed. The room was of average size but it was pristine and very modern - fit myself and my two friends comfortably. It was the location of the hotel that sealed the deal for us, we will definitely be returning again. There was several nice restaurants and bars within walking distance, and the Champs Elysees just around the corner - as well as the metro station. If you are a group of young people looking to enjoy Paris at night or a couple, this hotel would be perfect for you!
